trends: There has been one other sighting in Munster
There were no other sightings in Munster on or around July 4th 2010
Summary: Non pulsating orange light moving in a straight line west to northeast.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughters and I were watching fireworks in the back yard, and I noticed an orange light, almost looked like a plane landing light, but there was no sound, and it was orange. It moved rapidly from the east to northwest. I called my wife, other daughter and mother in law to see it, and they all witnessed the light.
